metadata.job_to_be_done: Create and manage fillable forms for onboarding and compliance.

extracted_sections.section_title: Change flat forms to fillable (Acrobat Pro)
Sharing Checklist for Real Estate Professionals

subsection_analysis.refined_text: You can change a flat form to a fillable form by either using the Prepare Form tool or enabling the Fill & Sign tools. Acrobat and Acrobat Reader users can use the Fill & Sign tool to fill in flat forms.
Create an appearance for your certificate-based signature. (See Create the signature appearance.)

The form author provides XML signing, validating, or clearing instructions for form events, such as button click, file save, or submit. XML data signatures conform to the W3C XML-Signature standard. Like PDF digital signatures, XML digital signatures ensure integrity, authentication, and non-repudiation in documents.
In the real estate industry, sharing documents efficiently is crucial for closing deals and keeping clients informed. Here's a tailored checklist to help you manage your PDF sharing needs.
Not all forms are fillable. Sometimes form creators dont convert their PDFs to interactive fillable forms.
